mapper.insert: insert into freeboard_reply(rno, bno, reply, replyer) values(seq_freeboard_reply.nextval, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: update freeboard_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select rno, bno, reply, replyer, replyDate, updateDate from freeboard_reply where bno = #{bno} order by rno asc
